verses.text_plain: And the Lord said unto Moses, Speak unto the priests the sons of Aaron, and say unto them, There shall none be defiled for the dead among his people:
verses.verse_html: 1And the Lord said unto Moses, Speak unto the priests the sons of Aaron, and say unto them, There shall none be defiled for the dead among his people:

tokens.text: unto them, There shall none be defiled

verses.text_plain: But for his kin, that is near unto him, that is, for his mother, and for his father, and for his son, and for his daughter, and for his brother,
verses.verse_html: 2But for his kin, that is near unto him, that is, for his mother, and for his father, and for his son, and for his daughter, and for his brother,

verses.text_plain: And for his sister a virgin, that is nigh unto him, which hath had no husband; for her may he be defiled.
verses.verse_html: 3And for his sister a virgin, that is nigh unto him, which hath had no husband; for her may he be defiled.

tokens.text: unto him, which hath had no husband
for her may he be defiled

verses.text_plain: But he shall not defile himself, being a chief man among his people, to profane himself.
verses.verse_html:
4But he shall not defile himself, being a chief man among his people, to profane himself. ▼
▼ he…: or, being an husband among his people, he shall not defile himself for his wife, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ he…: or, being an husband among his people, he shall not defile himself for his wife, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ he…: or, being an husband among his people, he shall not defile himself for his wife, etc

verses.text_plain: They shall not make baldness upon their head, neither shall they shave off the corner of their beard, nor make any cuttings in their flesh.
verses.verse_html: 5They shall not make baldness upon their head, neither shall they shave off the corner of their beard, nor make any cuttings in their flesh.

verses.text_plain: They shall be holy unto their God, and not profane the name of their God: for the offerings of the Lord made by fire, and the bread of their God, they do offer: therefore they shall be holy.
verses.verse_html: 6They shall be holy unto their God, and not profane the name of their God: for the offerings of the Lord made by fire, and the bread of their God, they do offer: therefore they shall be holy.

verses.text_plain: They shall not take a wife that is a whore, or profane; neither shall they take a woman put away from her husband: for he is holy unto his God.
verses.verse_html: 7They shall not take a wife that is a whore, or profane; neither shall they take a woman put away from her husband: for he is holy unto his God.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt sanctify him therefore; for he offereth the bread of thy God: he shall be holy unto thee: for I the Lord, which sanctify you, am holy.
verses.verse_html: 8Thou shalt sanctify him therefore; for he offereth the bread of thy God: he shall be holy unto thee: for I the Lord, which sanctify you, am holy.

tokens.text: unto thee: for I the Lord

verses.text_plain: And the daughter of any priest, if she profane herself by playing the whore, she profaneth her father: she shall be burnt with fire.
verses.verse_html: 9And the daughter of any priest, if she profane herself by playing the whore, she profaneth her father: she shall be burnt with fire.

verses.text_plain: And he that is the high priest among his brethren, upon whose head the anointing oil was poured, and that is consecrated to put on the garments, shall not uncover his head, nor rend his clothes;
verses.verse_html: 10And he that is the high priest among his brethren, upon whose head the anointing oil was poured, and that is consecrated to put on the garments, shall not uncover his head, nor rend his clothes;

verses.text_plain: Neither shall he go in to any dead body, nor defile himself for his father, or for his mother;
verses.verse_html: 11Neither shall he go in to any dead body, nor defile himself for his father, or for his mother;

verses.text_plain: Neither shall he go out of the sanctuary, nor profane the sanctuary of his God; for the crown of the anointing oil of his God is upon him: I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 12Neither shall he go out of the sanctuary, nor profane the sanctuary of his God; for the crown of the anointing oil of his God is upon him: I am the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And he shall take a wife in her virginity.
verses.verse_html: 13And he shall take a wife in her virginity.

verses.text_plain: A widow, or a divorced woman, or profane, or an harlot, these shall he not take: but he shall take a virgin of his own people to wife.
verses.verse_html: 14A widow, or a divorced woman, or profane, or an harlot, these shall he not take: but he shall take a virgin of his own people to wife.

verses.text_plain: Neither shall he profane his seed among his people: for I the Lord do sanctify him.
verses.verse_html: 15Neither shall he profane his seed among his people: for I the Lord do sanctify him.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.verse_html: 16And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.text_plain: Speak unto Aaron, saying, Whosoever he be of thy seed in their generations that hath any blemish, let him not approach to offer the bread of his God.
verses.verse_html:
17Speak unto Aaron, saying, Whosoever he be of thy seed in their generations that hath any blemish, let him not approach to offer the bread of his God. ▼
▼ bread: or, food

verses.text_plain: For whatsoever man he be that hath a blemish, he shall not approach: a blind man, or a lame, or he that hath a flat nose, or any thing superfluous,
verses.verse_html: 18For whatsoever man he be that hath a blemish, he shall not approach: a blind man, or a lame, or he that hath a flat nose, or any thing superfluous,

tokens.text: or he that hath a flat nose

verses.text_plain: Or a man that is brokenfooted, or brokenhanded,
verses.verse_html: 19Or a man that is brokenfooted, or brokenhanded,

verses.text_plain: Or crookbackt, or a dwarf, or that hath a blemish in his eye, or be scurvy, or scabbed, or hath his stones broken;
verses.verse_html:
20Or crookbackt, or a dwarf, or that hath a blemish in his eye, or be scurvy, or scabbed, or hath his stones broken; ▼
▼ a dwarf: or, too slender

footnotes.body_html: ▼ a dwarf: or, too slender

verses.text_plain: No man that hath a blemish of the seed of Aaron the priest shall come nigh to offer the offerings of the Lord made by fire: he hath a blemish; he shall not come nigh to offer the bread of his God.
verses.verse_html: 21No man that hath a blemish of the seed of Aaron the priest shall come nigh to offer the offerings of the Lord made by fire: he hath a blemish; he shall not come nigh to offer the bread of his God.

verses.text_plain: He shall eat the bread of his God, both of the most holy, and of the holy.
verses.verse_html: 22He shall eat the bread of his God, both of the most holy, and of the holy.

verses.text_plain: Only he shall not go in unto the vail, nor come nigh unto the altar, because he hath a blemish; that he profane not my sanctuaries: for I the Lord do sanctify them.
verses.verse_html: 23Only he shall not go in unto the vail, nor come nigh unto the altar, because he hath a blemish; that he profane not my sanctuaries: for I the Lord do sanctify them.

tokens.text: Only he shall not go in

verses.text_plain: And Moses told it unto Aaron, and to his sons, and unto all the children of Israel.
verses.verse_html: 24And Moses told it unto Aaron, and to his sons, and unto all the children of Israel.
